item.title: Wing Anti-Ice VALVE Light or WAI Indications – Valve Verified Operative

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided associated valve is verified to be operative before departure in known or forecast icing conditions.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Placard on Pilot’s Overhead Panel: "LEFT (RIGHT) WAI VALVE IND INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: To verify valve associated with inoperative VALVE light or WAI indication is operative, perform the Wing Thermal Anti-Ice System Test (AMM 30-11-00/504) excluding the Wing TAI system CMC ground test.

note.para: Since VALVE Light and/or EICAS WAI indications are inoperative under this MMEL item, disregard test procedure steps calling for verification that these items function. Verification is by observing the position indicator on the valve assembly on the wing.
